channel.title: Need help, fast!

item.title: Need help, fast!
item.dc:creator: @mat8913 mat8913
item.description:
@mat8913 wrote:

[quote=“casey, post:1, topic:6813”]alright well im trying to add trimming to my server before i release it to the public, im running testscape

i have this code:

if(itemUsed == 2357 && useWith == 1079)
				{
					deleteItem(2357,getItemSlot(2357),1);
					deleteItem(1079,getItemSlot(1079),1);
					addItem(2617,1);
					sendMessage("You trim your Rune platelegs");
				}

its with the rest of the use item on item parts but in the server I use a gold bar (2357) with rune plate legs (1079)

and it does absolutely nothing.

i am running testscape please someone help[/quote]

Did you use gold bar (2357) with rune plate legs (1079) or rune plate legs (1079) with gold bar (2357) ?

If you want to use rune plate legs (1079) with gold bar (2357) you also have to add:

if(itemUsed == 1079 && useWith == 2357) { deleteItem(2357,getItemSlot(2357),1); deleteItem(1079,getItemSlot(1079),1); addItem(2617,1); sendMessage("You trim your Rune platelegs"); }

Read full topic

Wolfeyes217:

Cause the 2nd item is an object.

not true thats use item with item use item on object looks like this

else if(useItemID == ITEMID && atObjectID == OBJECTID); [br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 05:15:58 PM[/size][hr]come on someone help please?
